quality_assessment: Excellent documentation with comprehensive coverage of all output formats. All implementation details are accurately documented.
positive_aspects: Comprehensive coverage of all three output formats (terminal, JSON, markdown)
Clear examples for every major feature and use case
Accurate documentation of CLI flags and their behavior
Excellent CI/CD integration examples for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and Jenkins
Detailed jq query examples for JSON processing
Well-documented format comparison and migration guidance
All internal links are valid and correctly reference other chapters
Accurate boundary condition documentation for thresholds (verified against tests)
Clear distinction between CLI features and library-only features
Proper documentation of filtering options and their cross-format applicability
Detailed troubleshooting section covering common issues
Accurate exit code documentation matching implementation
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding example output showing what --explain-metrics actually displays
Could expand verbosity level examples to show more concrete output differences
Consider adding a quick reference table for all CLI flags with descriptions

metadata.validation_focus: Verify output format documentation matches src/io/ implementation
